text:
And one more question here just to be clear: `utility-credential-app-v0-0.2.1`  is the latest release, right? So we are not asking people to downgrade, we are running the correct latest release?
<https://docs.digitalasset-staging.com/utilities/0.7/releases/index.html>
I see here it is indeed 0.2.1, but here <https://docs.digitalasset-staging.com/utilities/0.7/dar-versions.html> it is 0.1.0 for Mainnet? And the bundle version is 0.6.1 here: <https://docs.digitalasset.com/utilities/0.7/canton-utility-setup/utility-setup>

But we can just send this last link to them, and they should have the latest versions following the links on this page.

Thanks!

text:
the latter, keycloak as always worked with the validator but the auto topup application expects the sub field value to be `<keycloak-client-id>@clients`. I know the documentation state it should be  (<https://docs.sync.global/validator_operator/validator_helm.html#oidc-provider-requirements> ) but you cant change sub thus I am getting sub of my jwt token to be '517109cd-ebea-4b89-8121-0fa0756c9e89' which is the service account user automatically attached to the keycloak client id

```Claims are only valid for userId '517109cd-ebea-4b89-8121-0fa0756c9e89', actual userId is 'utility-topup@clients'```
